channel.title: The class you hate the most at school
channel.description: The class I hate the most would be Math. My favorite is a tie between P.E. and U.S? History

item.description:
@B2300_T4nk wrote:

[quote=“ranger squad, post:64, topic:379786”]1/2 course ICT at my school has been replaced with “functional skills” - you get 50/80 marks for: logging into an email account, reading an email and replying to it, and then reading another email (with a blank word document attached) that says in red “VIRUS ATTACHED” and deleting it.
Pshhhttt.[/quote]Lold. In ICT(since 6th grade till 1st grade) We used to take 40 minutes of typing and then we go do some shit form this book called Techno[insert gay name here]

item.source: The class you hate the most at school

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

[quote=“The Wanderer, post:83, topic:379786”]School bores me. I personally can’t wait till college. Sleep 2-3 periods a day out of my 5, yet I have no problem keeping up with grades. Taking on a challenge this year as a Sophomore. Took Chemistry Honors, and the teacher that teaches it doesn’t give A’s to Sophomores. She says that Chemistry is a Junior only class and that no Sophomore deserves an A. I’ve seen people get pissed off because she didn’t like the way they wrote their letter “d”. She counted as if the letter didn’t even exist so therefore they got an F on the paper. She also counted one person as never turning in an assignment because they put DJ instead of their real name. Shall be interesting. :)[/quote]That sucks, I thought my teacher who never gave 90%+ was bad. She said that no one is perfect in French, so why should I give you a 100%? And then this really smart girl in our class started to get high marks, and on her report card got only a 90%. She aced pretty much every assignment.

Read full topic
item.source: The class you hate the most at school

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

[quote=“xryz, post:84, topic:379786”][quote author=The Wanderer link=topic=475631.msg3665988#msg3665988 date=1310617862]
School bores me. I personally can’t wait till college. Sleep 2-3 periods a day out of my 5, yet I have no problem keeping up with grades. Taking on a challenge this year as a Sophomore. Took Chemistry Honors, and the teacher that teaches it doesn’t give A’s to Sophomores. She says that Chemistry is a Junior only class and that no Sophomore deserves an A. I’ve seen people get pissed off because she didn’t like the way they wrote their letter “d”. She counted as if the letter didn’t even exist so therefore they got an F on the paper. She also counted one person as never turning in an assignment because they put DJ instead of their real name. Shall be interesting.
[/quote]

um wow if that ever happened to me i sure wouldnt put up with it. that reason she gave about not giving sophomores an A is so fail, if that was the only reason to not get an A in that class i would take it up with someone above her, and that not liking the way they write their d’s i would be the same way(taking it to a higher power). if not even the school board will do anything about it, then go to the state government, crap like that cant be taken lightly.[/quote]
People complain, but they don’t complain to the right people. If she does stuff like that to me though, I’m going to ask her how do I fix it, and then if she doesn’t tell me/acknowledge me trying to correct whatever bullshit thing she doesn’t like, then I’ll just go and complain to the right people.

Read full topic
item.source: The class you hate the most at school

I hate all of school to be honest. Not for the reasons of others “hurr im to lasy to werk” it’s because I switched schools, and I have no friends. None.[/quote]

i still love u cole.

Read full topic
item.source: The class you hate the most at school

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

The Wanderer:

School bores me. I personally can’t wait till college. Sleep 2-3 periods a day out of my 5, yet I have no problem keeping up with grades. Taking on a challenge this year as a Sophomore. Took Chemistry Honors, and the teacher that teaches it doesn’t give A’s to Sophomores. She says that Chemistry is a Junior only class and that no Sophomore deserves an A. I’ve seen people get pissed off because she didn’t like the way they wrote their letter “d”. She counted as if the letter didn’t even exist so therefore they got an F on the paper. She also counted one person as never turning in an assignment because they put DJ instead of their real name. Shall be interesting.

um wow if that ever happened to me i sure wouldnt put up with it. that reason she gave about not giving sophomores an A is so fail, if that was the only reason to not get an A in that class i would take it up with someone above her, and that not liking the way they write their d’s i would be the same way(taking it to a higher power). if not even the school board will do anything about it, then go to the state government, crap like that cant be taken lightly.

about the college it depends where u go. my college i go from 8am to 2pm and only have 3 classes. i cant skip any classes(well i can but u can only miss 10 classes b4 they start taking 1% of ur final grade and after a certain amount of days u will be asked to withdraw from the college unless u have a legit excuse to mess class like that. depending on where u go and how ur instructor is, u can skip their entire class and just take the tests and quizzes and pass the course).

if im tardy(even arriving to class the minute, class is to start) u get 1% knocked of ur final grade in the class. the attendance thing at my college is like that to help us understand the importance of being on time, and to knew that employers dont tolerate bad attendance in the work place. our grading scale is different also but that doesnt matter.

Read full topic

School bores me. I personally can’t wait till college. Sleep 2-3 periods a day out of my 5, yet I have no problem keeping up with grades. Taking on a challenge this year as a Sophomore. Took Chemistry Honors, and the teacher that teaches it doesn’t give A’s to Sophomores. She says that Chemistry is a Junior only class and that no Sophomore deserves an A. I’ve seen people get pissed off because she didn’t like the way they wrote their letter “d”. She counted as if the letter didn’t even exist so therefore they got an F on the paper. She also counted one person as never turning in an assignment because they put DJ instead of their real name. Shall be interesting.

item.source: The class you hate the most at school

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @xryz xryz
item.description:
@xryz wrote:

[quote=“Slave Scyth, post:77, topic:379786”][quote author=xryz link=topic=501096.msg3665928#msg3665928 date=1310614666]
english i hated the most. why idk, if i would have learned the stuff in elementary maybe i wouldnt have hated it. probably why i dont like english is its so annoying; reading is ok as long as the book is interesting; writing i hate so much, its either i have so much in my mind that idk what to write or how to start, or that i have nothing in my head to write about; also it doesnt help that i hate doing anything that isnt going to be done right the first time…

classes i liked: chem, math, history, german, band, and engineering(so pretty much any class that wasnt english. lol). the classes i liked most likely i liked b/c that are straight forward and so much better than english.
[/quote]I just can’t stand English teachers that try to find the meaning in everything.

[/quote]

+1

Read full topic

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @Slave_Scyth Slave Scyth
item.description:
@Slave_Scyth wrote:

[quote=“Davidi2, post:70, topic:379786”]I personally hate history. I mean I love learning new stuff, but they just go on and on and on and on and on, and then make you memorize all sorts of dates and stuff (which is one thing I have trouble with)

Haha “Warning - while you were typing a new reply has been posted. You may wish to review your post.”, and it’s Slave Scyth posting almost exactly what I did.[/quote]
Awesome minds think alike. Thank God my high school had Psych as a ‘Social Studies’ credit – I couldn’t handle doing AP US History memorization or something like that.

usman555:

Got a 100% on geometry.

Damn you. I like math, but proofs absolutely murdered that final grade for me.

Read full topic
item.source: The class you hate the most at school

item.title: The class you hate the most at school
item.dc:creator: @usman555 usman555
item.description:
@usman555 wrote:

I like to learn pretty much every subject, but history kinda annoys me. It’s because you read about the past and I’m always like “What happened, happened, now get on with your life”. And I just can’t describe why I hate it so much, it’s just that I like other subjects more. My favourite is science, cuz it’s so interesting. 2nd fave is math cuz I’m awesome at it. Got a 100% on geometry.

Read full topic
